name: Invisible Neighbors
description:
Story:
Nathan learns that the house he once thought a "Safe haven" isn't really a haven when his life is put at risk.

Genre: Visual Novel

Controls:

Left CTRL to skip dialogue. 

Space bar/left mouse click/ Enter to progress through the text.

You can save/load the game and also view the options in the ESC (escape) menu.

The game has 3 endings:

Ending A 

Ending B

Ending C (True Ending)

This game was a submission to 

M6GJ-3 Gamejam
